file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-32-05-04 - DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the DC-to-DC converter of the CD player. B. The DC-to-DC converter is installed in the forward galley, zone 232. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) 23-32-05-000-804-A DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - REMOVAL EMB-135 ACFT MODEL(S) 23-32-05-400-804-A DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - INSTALLATION EMB-135 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-2 23-32-05 Page 1 of 6 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-32-05-000-804-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 2. DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the removal of the DC-to-DC converter. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 232 Forward galley C. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially 3/32 Allen wrench To release the ceiling panel available D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward galley H. Preparation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 841-017-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers below and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to them: • MUSIC (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 1/SERVICE/MUSIC). • PA (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/PA). Open the door (13). (2) Push the hot jugs to remove it from the galley. I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-017-A (1) Remove the screws (1). (2) With a Allen wrench, release the ceiling panel. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-804-A/400 CONFIG-2 23-32-05 Page 2 of 6 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Carefully move the LH edge of the access panel (2) to release it, then pull and disengage it from the forward galley. (4) Remove the screws (6) and washers (5) that attach the terminal lugs (7) to the DC-to- DC converter (4). (5) Remove the screws (3) that attach the DC-to-DC converter (4) to the forward galley. (6) Remove the DC-to-DC converter (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-804-A/400 CONFIG-2 23-32-05 Page 3 of 6 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

+ - + - AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 DC-to-DC Converter - Removal/Installation Figure 401 C A ZONE 232 B DET. A D ALLEN WRENCH 1. SCREW (2) VIEW B DET. C 7. TERMINAL LUG (4) 6. SCREW (4) 5. WASHER (4) 4. DC-TO-DC CONVERTER E 3. SCREW (4) 2. ACCESS PANEL VIEW E DET. D 145AMM230225.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-804-A/400 CONFIG-2 23-32-05 Page 4 of 6 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-32-05-400-804-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 3. DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the installation of the DC-to-DC converter. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-801-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-802-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-804-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-805-A/500 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 232 Forward galley D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially 3/32 Allen wrench To release the ceiling panel available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward galley I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-017-A (1) Put the DC-to-DC converter (4) in position. (2) Install the screws (3) to attach the DC-to-DC converter (4) to the forward galley. (3) Put the terminal lugs (7) in position. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-804-A/400 CONFIG-2 23-32-05 Page 5 of 6 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Install the screws (6) and washer (5) to attach the terminal lugs (7) to the DC-to-DC converter (4). (5) Install the access panel (2). (6) With the Allen wrench, attach the ceiling panel. J. Follow-on (Figure 401) SUBTASK 842-017-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers listed below and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from them: • MUSIC (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 1/SERVICE/MUSIC). • PA (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/PA). (2) (Aircraft with CD player model DEH-245) Do the CD player model DEH-245 operational test (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-801-A/500) or (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-802-A/500, if you turn on the CD player with the SOURCE pushbutton). (3) (Aircraft with CD player model DEH-1000) Do the CD player model DEH-1000 operational test (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-804-A/500) or (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-805-A/500, if you turn on the CD player with the SOURCE pushbutton). (4) Install the hot jugs in the galley. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-804-A/400 CONFIG-2 23-32-05 Page 6 of 6 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
